## BaseWsClient.connect() method

Start connecting, you must connect first before `callApi()` and `sendMsg()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(): Promise<{
        isSucc: true;
    } | {
        isSucc: false;
        errMsg: string;
    }>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ isSucc: true; } \| { isSucc: false; errMsg: string; }&gt;

## Exceptions

never
